page.title: 17POPLAR AVE COMMUNITY CENTRE
page.content: The{Community Centre}is about 14 years old.It was built by the council in 1970.It was built to serve the people in the{Community.}The{Community {Centre }raises money by having jumble sales,car boot sales, bingo,weddings, and discos. It costs a lot to run a {Community Centre}because of the heating and paying cleaners.Most of the work at the{Community Centre}is voluntary.The{Community Centre captures just for Dogsthorpe and Welland estate.The{Commitee}meet on one night of the month.Many old people come to the{Community Centre.}It takes up a lot of the lady's time because she has got to run the playgroup and the playscheme.They open at weekends on a private hire.There are about 600 members of the{Community Centre. { }
